name: Robo's little adventure
description:
You robot companion, Robo, need some help!

Find all his body parts and escape the room by driving your toy car!

Caution: this game needs steam vr device and an htc vive tracker to work correctly!

Control:

1.Press trigger to select/ accelerate.

2.Press the grip button to reset your view.

3.Press the touch pad to decelerate / reverse.

Authors:

Producer: Yang

 Programmer: Alan 

Sound: Karen

Artist: Chelsea
